name: The Bricksperience
description:
The Bricksperience is a relaxing game in which you build brick-building sets from the point of view of a minifigure. By finishing sets you earn Bricksperience Points which allow you to unlock new features to help you build sets faster and more convenient. When you're tired of the sets that come with the game, you can import custom sets made in LDraw applications using the ingame editor.

Any set you import is also compatible and available in The Bricksperience VR.
